comments.body: What happens if a default backend is not provided but a non-matching path is accessed?  I sort of feel like a default backend is required, not optional

I think it's confusing to require a default like gce does. It forces you to take one from your paths and dump it there or create a new one, increasing the size of what should be a tiny resource. I was hoping (and this might be a stretch) to serve some sort of index page on apiserver and default it as the backend. 

In the case you mentioned curl will hang for a bit and then err out the browser will do whatever it does for bad url.
